annotations.description: It's time for another viewer created cocktail! One of my absolute favorites! You'll hear what I have to say about the drink in the video so instead, here's s...
annotations.title: Viewer Created: The Macho Manhattan

textContent:
2 oz Michters Rye
.75 oz Licor 43
.5oz Sweet Vermouth
1 Barspoon of Luxardo Cherry Juice

Stir and strain into rocks glass over large ice
Garnished with a Luxardo Cherry on a metal spear

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqGbntR6q7E
title: Macho Manhattan
